title: How long it may take to fully charge E5377Bs-508 and how long E5377Bs-508 can work by using the fully charged battery?
answer:
A: 

 1. Time to full charge E5377Bs-508 battery 

 Device off charged by AC charger:** 3h** 

 2. Maximum working time(Attention：It’s depend on the network status and environment temperature): 

 Using battery and WI-FI enabled (with data transmission):6hours. 

 Using battery and WI-FI disabled (standby mode):300h 

 Some improper uses will influent the life of battery, for example: used under high/low temperature and humid environment, leaving battery unused for long time, the battery be charged and discharged for too many times 

    The operating temperature required by the battery is 0℃to+35℃,the storage temperature is -20℃to +60℃  ( the ideal value is 35℃)，the relative humidity is 5℃-95℃（the ideal value is 55℃）.
